name: Bubble Pop Origin! Puzzle Game
description:
Bubble Pop Origin is a exciting bubble shooter game that’s highly addictive!

You will spend hours of fun matching the same colored bubbles and you won’t put it down!
Full of tricky levels, this bubble shooter is set to eradicate your boredom.
Train your brain to aim & shoot and burst & drop all the bubbles using epic blasters to clear the board and win coins!
Blast your way to victory in this explosive shooting game!

Are you ready to dive into Bubble Pop Origin?
Don't miss out on this relaxing fun game, and download NOW for FREE!

HOW TO PLAY
• Aim and Release where you want!
• Match 3 or more bubbles to make them pop!
• Use less shots to score higher and try to earn 3 stars.
• Create powerful boosters & items to help you blast through levels.

POWERFUL BOOSTERS
• Match 20+ bubbles to create a BOMB.
• Make 7 combos to create a ROCKET.

FEATURES
• Hundreds of unique levels with various fun challenges!
• Easy to learn but difficult to master.
• No WiFi needed. Play anytime, anywhere.
• Play everyday to get special rewards!
• Soothing sounds and gorgeous visual effects.

NOTES
• Bubble Pop Origin! contains ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• Bubble Pop Origin! is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items like AD FREE and coins.

E-MAIL
• help@puzzle1sutdio.com

App Permissions
[Required Permissions]
- none
[Optional Permissions]
- Photo / Media / File: required storage access permission to save game data
